Hello, this is my first suggestion over here, so be nice

Well my idea is basicaly a Prop which would let stuff to rotate ( Yeah, like rotor block on Space engineers ), maybe with limitations or not, or with friction or other stuff.

The stuff this feature will allow to make goes from artificial gravity on space stations, with out having them to rotate, to helicopters or VTOLs like the osprey (using blades to fly or thrusters).

Hey there, and welcome to the forums.

As per the rules of the Suggestions and Development Discussion section, I'd really advise you have a look at the [thread=36863]What Not to Suggest List[/thread]. Mechanical parts and/or robotics are something that crop up fairly often in this forum, so unless you have specific ideas on the implementation of them, just rest assured that the devs are very much aware that there is a demand for mechanical parts of some kind. However, as this is one of the items on the What Not to Suggest List, I'm going to have to close this one for now.

In the interim, you may want to have a look around for the Damned Robotics mod (check the Add-On Releases forum), which as far as I know has a great many types of moving structures available.
